snippet.title: Nicktropolis Demo Reel | Journey Through Nickelodeon's Virtual Reality World
snippet.description:
Step into the Virtual World of Nicktropolis!

Discover Nickelodeon's pioneering virtual community created exclusively for kids—Nicktropolis. Launched on January 30, 2007, this immersive virtual world offered young fans a dynamic multimedia experience filled with their favorite web-based activities.

In this sizzle reel, the ad sales team introduces potential advertisers to the innovative features and engaging gameplay of Nicktropolis. Explore early versions of user interactions, chat, and branded areas, showcasing the unique experiences tailored for Nickelodeon enthusiasts.

Key Highlights of Nicktropolis:

Personalize your adventure with the Nickself creator and room decoration options.

Engage in real-time chats with friends or beloved Nickelodeon characters.

Navigate through the vibrant map, visiting iconic show rooms like Spongebob's Pineapple or Jimmy Neutron's lab.

Enjoy carnival-like fun with in-world games and midway rides.

Impressive stats reveal 7 million active users, 108 billion gameplays in six months, and 45 minutes average time spent per session.

Developed using advanced technologies like Flash/Flex ActionScript 3, XML, JavaScript, and Dynamo, Nicktropolis set a new standard in virtual world experiences for kids.

Want to learn more about the innovation behind Nicktropolis? Visit Alex Westerman's website, one of its creators, for an in-depth look at this groundbreaking platform in kids' gaming.

https://alexwesterman.com/project/nicktropolis/

Keywords: Nickelodeon, Virtual Community, Nicktropolis, Virtual World, Nickelodeon Games, Virtual World Experience

Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more insights into the world of gaming and entertainment!

Some big stats:
Active registered users = 7,000,000
In world gameplays In the first six months = 108,000,000,000
Average time spent = 45 min
Fish created in the aquarium = 500,000


00:00 Introduction
00:16 Nickself creator
00:28 Decorate your room
00:39 Chat with your friends
00:50 The map
01:10 Visiting show rooms
01:37 Play in world games
02:14 Buy stuff
